Only an idiot gets offended by porn.  FYI, the author of Yotsuba, Kiyohiko Azuma, did in fact draw a porno doujin.  And although it isn't translated, it appears to contain futanari, tentacle rape, monster rape, and chloroform.  Sooooo....considering that everyone in this doujin is human and consenting, I'd say bitching about this is retarded.  It's called Inma no Ranbu if you want to see it.
